text: [[col:red]]This rite will unlock after constructing the Haunted Citadel building.[[/col]]
[[col:red]]This rite will unlock after owning 3 settlements.[[/col]]
[[col:red]]This rite will unlock after owning 20 units.[[/col]]
[[col:red]]This rite will unlock after performing an action with a Hellwraith [[img:icon_hero]][[/img]]Hero.[[/col]]
